data.eml:eml: A new species of Microlithosia Daniel, 1954 from India (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ranjan, Rahul (2017): A new species of Microlithosia Daniel, 1954 from India (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4319 (2): 383-385, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4319.2.10
